name: PIDHIRTSI CASTLE
generalDescription: The commemorative coins is dedicated to Pidhirtsi Castle, a historical and architectural masterpiece of the seventeenth century, one of the most beautiful Ukrainian castles in the Renaissance style.
averseDescription: Obverse: above, there is the legend УКРАЇНА (UKRAINE) under which there is the Small Coat of Arms of Ukraine; below, the face value: 5/ГРИВЕНЬ (5/hryvnias); in the center, there is a conventionalized Baroque cartouche featuring the castle plan. On the German silver coin, below, there is the mark of the National Bank of Ukraine Mint to the left.
reverseDescription: On the reverse, there is depicted Pidhirtsi Castle, in the foreground, there are horsemen; against a smooth background, there are the legends: ПІДГОРЕЦЬКИЙ ЗАМОК (PIDHIRTSI CASTLE) (above, in a semicircle), XVII cт. (17th century) (below).
